thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 13 of 3563
thread.title: Minh

author: Minh
title: Minh
text: I've bought several books from Thrift Books now and they have always been of a good price and delivered very promptly. Though there are some times when the books seemed to be priced higher than local stores or Amazon, these seem to be rare occasions that probably meant the book is sold out . Otherwise, I have never been able to find a book of good quality (nearly new in fact) and get it ship freely so quickly at any other store for such a low price.
